front.title: NAT64-CPE Mode Operation for Opening Residential Service

abstract.t: The document has proposed an approach of NAT64-CPE mode, which would give residential service opportunities to be accessed by remote subscribers going through IPv6 networks. The document captures the fundamental NAT64 functionalities with special cares to fit into CPE scenarios and don't need cooperate with DNS64 any more. It will compatible with legacy residential servers and no further updates requirements to DNS.
